description: Turn ravioli into a clever snack with these cheesy air-fryer pasta chips. Served with a bolognese dipping sauce, it's a new and delicious way to enjoy pasta.
name: Cheesy Bolognese Pasta Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250 g Macro Organic bolognese chunky pasta sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Working in 2 batches, place ravioli in airfryer basket and cook for 12 minutes, shaking every couple of minutes, or until golden. Transfer to a serving tray and scatter over extra parmesan and parsley. Serve with bolognese sauce.

Working in 2 batches, place ravioli in airfryer basket and cook for 12 minutes, shaking every couple of minutes, or until golden. Transfer to a serving tray and scatter over extra parmesan and parsley. Serve with bolognese sauce.
